statements: SELECT * FROM quiz_data;
SELECT quiz_name, total_score FROM quiz_data WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, result FROM quiz_data WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_date FROM quiz_data WHERE total_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS quiz_count FROM quiz_data GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM quiz_data WHERE result = 'pass';
SELECT quiz_name, student_id FROM quiz_data WHERE quiz_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT quiz_name, total_score FROM quiz_data WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT result FROM quiz_data;
SELECT quiz_name, total_score, result FROM quiz_data WHERE result = 'fail' AND total_score < 50;
SELECT * FROM Quiz WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_id, quiz_name, score FROM Quiz WHERE score > 80;
SELECT id, student_id, quiz_name, score FROM Quiz WHERE quiz_name LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM Test WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_id, test_name FROM Test ORDER BY test_name ASC, student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quiz WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_id, quiz_name FROM Quiz WHERE score > 90;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM Test WHERE grade < 70;
SELECT quiz_name, score FROM Quiz ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT test_name, grade FROM Test ORDER BY grade ASC;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE score > 80
SELECT test_id, test_date FROM Tests ORDER BY test_date DESC
SELECT student_id, quiz_date FROM Quizzes WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM Questions WHERE quiz_id = 2 AND test_id = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_quizzes FROM Quizzes
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_id, student_id, quiz_date FROM Quizzes WHERE student_id = 5 ORDER BY quiz_date DESC;
SELECT quiz_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM Quizzes GROUP BY quiz_id;
SELECT question_id, question_text, quiz_id, test_id FROM Questions WHERE quiz_id = 3 OR test_id = 2;
SELECT test_id, student_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM Tests GROUP BY test_id HAVING AVG(score) > 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, major FROM students WHERE gpa > 3.5;
SELECT quiz_name, created_date FROM quizes ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM questions WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, quiz_name, score FROM students s JOIN student_quiz_scores sqs ON s.student_id = sqs.student_id JOIN quizes q ON sqs.quiz_id = q.quiz_id;
SELECT * FROM quizes;
SELECT quiz_name, course_id, created_date FROM quizes WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY created_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, quiz_name, score FROM students JOIN student_quiz_scores ON students.student_id = student_quiz_scores.student_id JOIN quizes ON student_quiz_scores.quiz_id = quizes.quiz_id WHERE students.major = 'Computer Science' AND score >= 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM questions WHERE question_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY question_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, major, avg(gpa) AS avg_gpa FROM students GROUP BY major HAVING avg_gpa > 3.5 ORDER BY avg_gpa DESC;
SELECT * FROM QuizScores;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM TestScores WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, instructor FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Database%' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM QuizQuestions WHERE question_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM QuizScores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT first_name, last_name, major FROM Students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE instructor LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT student_id, test_id, subject, score FROM TestScores WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT question_id, quiz_id, question_text FROM QuizQuestions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
